views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 8 to 12

With TabBarsControl you can Manage the Tab Bars Buttons on System Wide.

Configure options from Settings.

No Respring Needed for enabling and disabling the Tweak and its options.

See Screenshots below.

Feel free to contact me via Mail or via Twitter @CydiaGeek, enjoy it, thanks! :)

would be greatly appreciated!


See larger Screenshots below..

Version 1.0.7 - Added Support for arm64e/A12 Devices. Version 1.0.5
- As Requested, Added iOS 12 Compatibility (tip by Frozen Penguin for Remove Space Below option on iOS 12).
- Added Colors in Prefs (CoreGraphics Frameworks).
- Changes in Prefs Labels.
Version 1.0.4
- Added the option to Enable the Bold Tab Bars Font.
- Added the option to Enable the Large Tab Bars Font.
(Thanks sinfool patches).
Version 1.0.3
- Added the option to Enable the Dark Tab Bar.
- Added the option to Enable the Transparent Tab Bar.
- Added the option to Remove the Tab Bar Blur.
- Added the option to Remove the Tab Bar Space Below (Suggested and Requested by Easy Z on Twitter).


Version 1.0.2
- Added the option to Enable the White Tab Bar (tip by sinfool).
Version 1.0.1
- Tested and Working Fine also on iOS 8 (Download Enabled). Thanks Johnny Gonzalez for testing.
